ygData.subject: Re: Disenchant and Antimagic Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm. I was in P4 beta and there were no songs over L20 on the vendors until the second last day. Are you sure about this? I d be more inclined to think the
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Sep 16/99, Rebecca Small <macha_nabaob@...> wrote:
> From: "Rebecca Small" <macha_nabaob@...>
>
> Greeting fellow Bards,
> I was under the impression that the Antimagic Song was an AOE or party only
> that prevented harmful spells from being cast on the party by any attacking
> mobs. I watched my husband and his group in beta attack the Karanas Ogre
> camp and they specifically had a L40+ bard to sing this song to prevent
> members from being charmed.

Hmm. I was in P4 beta and there were no songs over L20 on the vendors
until the second last day. Are you sure about this? I'd be more inclined
to think the bard was playing a magic resist song.


--
